entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
